participant_id.Description: anonymized participant IDs of XP2 dataset

handedness.Description: Preferred use of the right hand, left hand, or one or the other depending on the task

Levels.R: Righthander. Tendency to use the right hand more naturally
Levels.L: Lefthander. Tendency to use the left hand more naturally

phenotype_description.Description: Description of the phenotype for the subject

misc_comments.Description: Miscellaneous comments on study, interview, methodology relevant to this form data
